Package me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server

Class ServerUser

java.lang.Object
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.SimEntity
me.marcosassuncao.servsim.server.ServerUser
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventSink<SimEvent>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReservationServerUser
public abstract class ServerUser extends SimEntity
Entity represents a user who sends jobs to another entity.
Author:
Marcos Dias de Assuncao

    • onShutdown

      public void onShutdown()
      Description copied from class: SimEntity
      This method is invoked by the Simulation before the simulation finishes. If you want to save data in log files this is the method in which the corresponding code would be placed.
      Specified by:
      onShutdown in class SimEntity

    • cancelJob

      public void cancelJob(int dst, int jobId)
      Cancels a job in execution.
      Parameters:
      dst - the id of the destination entity
      jobId - the Id of the job to be cancelled

    • submitJob

      public void submitJob(int dst, long delay, Job job)
      Sends a job to a given entity, such as a server.
      Parameters:
      dst - the id of the destination entity
      delay - the delay for sending the job
      job - the job to be sent
